plugins.name: Design to System
plugins.description:
Design to System is a Figma plugin that helps you convert your existing designs into a structured design system ‚Äî effortlessly.

With just a few clicks, you can extract styles from your design, register them as local styles, and reapply them consistently across your file.


Key Features

  1. üîç Analyze Selection : Extracts all design style properties (colors, text styles, shadows) from the selected layers. Color values are automatically categorized into background, text, and stroke styles for easier organization.
  2. üìå Register Styles : Registers the extracted styles into your Figma local styles panel. This enables consistent reuse and supports design system creation.
  3. üéØ Apply Styles : Applies the registered local styles back to the selected design elements ‚Äî ensuring consistency and systemization.
plugins.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system ‚Äì automatically.

136167.name: Design to System
136167.description:

Key Features

  2. üìå Register Styles : Registers the extracted styles into your Figma local styles panel. This enables consistent reuse and supports design system creation.
  3. üéØ Apply Styles : Applies the registered local styles back to the selected design elements ‚Äî ensuring consistency and systemization.
136167.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system ‚Äì automatically.

plugins.name: Logo Master
plugins.description: Logo Master lets you quickly browse, search, and insert a vast library of SVG logos directly into your designs. Filter by category or letter, choose color, white, or black variants, and select multiple logos for a fast bulk import onto your canvas.
plugins.tagline: Instantly add, search, and import SVG logos.

136677.name: Logo Master
136677.description: Logo Master lets you quickly browse, search, and insert a vast library of SVG logos directly into your designs. Filter by category or letter, choose color, white, or black variants, and select multiple logos for a fast bulk import onto your canvas.
136677.tagline: Instantly add, search, and import SVG logos.

plugins.name: Color Explorer
plugins.description:
üé® What is Color Explorer?

Color Explorer is a smart Figma plugin designed to help designers, early-stage founders, agencies, strategists, DTC operators, and marketers quickly find the perfect color palettes for their brand.


With over 3,000+ curated palettes (increasing everyday), you can preview and apply full-brand color systems to any selected frame or layer‚Äîin one click.


üöÄ Key Features

  1. Alpha-Safe Mapping: Automatically preserves transparency values (alpha channel)
  2. 3000+ Color Palettes: Handpicked and categorized palettes to match different brand moods and industries
  3. One-Click Apply: Instantly replace all fill/stroke/text colors in your selection
  4. Lightweight and Fast: Designed for speed and real-time creative flow


üîß Use Cases

  1. Explore visual directions before committing to a brand look
  2. Save time in early-stage design sprints
  3. Quickly swap palettes in Figma without manual editing
  4. Present polished options to clients and stakeholders


üí∏ One-Time Purchase

Get lifetime access for a one-time fee of $10. No subscription. Free updates forever.
plugins.tagline: One Click to Try 3000+ Color Palettes on Your Design.

plugins.name: Token Architect
plugins.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks
  3. Teams using tools like Style Dictionary, Tokens Studio, or custom token pipelines
  4. Organisations scaling design systems across products and platforms



Please reach out to ozarg.studio@gmail.com if you have any issues or would like to request a feature. Or let's connect on LinkedIn. Cool ideas welcome :)

accepted.name: OZAR STUDIO
accepted.description: We are a design studio working worldwide . We provide a range of design and development services.

plugins.tagline: Export and Import your variables in a developer-friendy way

plugins.name: Fast Page Selector
plugins.description:
Efficient page selection and navigation when working with files containing many pages.


Features

  1. Page Grouping: Automatically group pages using Divider pages (pages starting with `---` or containing `divider`)
  2. Select by select box: Display each group in select boxes for intuitive page selection
  3. Compact View: Hide/Show functionality to minimize plugin window and efficiently utilize workspace
plugins.tagline: Navigate hundreds of pages in a flash.

134511.name: Fast Page Selector
134511.description:
Efficient page selection and navigation when working with files containing many pages.


Features

  1. Page Grouping: Automatically group pages using Divider pages (pages starting with `---` or containing `divider`)
  2. Select by select box: Display each group in select boxes for intuitive page selection
  3. Compact View: Hide/Show functionality to minimize plugin window and efficiently utilize workspace
134511.release_notes: Fix cannot moving page when selected
134511.tagline: Navigate hundreds of pages in a flash.

plugins.name: QR Generator
plugins.description:
Generate crisp, scannable QR codes directly in Figma‚Äîfor free. Whether you‚Äôre linking to a website, product, or prototype, it‚Äôs never been easier to add functional codes to your designs.


Need more than just the basics? Unlock the ability to fully customize your QR codes:

‚Äì Adjust colors to match your brand

‚Äì Tweak corner and eye styles

‚Äì Control padding, sizing, and error correction

‚Äì Apply your own design language


Perfect for teams and designers who want their work to look as good as it works.

Use it for client presentations, posters, packaging, or anything else where detail matters.


Free to generate. Paid to make it yours.


You can contact us at support@easestud.io

visit easestud.io
plugins.tagline: Simple QR codes, beautifully yours.

plugins.name: Designsystemet - Code syntax
plugins.description:
Dette er en tredjeparts plugin som kan generere CSS-syntax fra designsystemet. Den vil g√• gjennom alle variablene som er tilgjengelig for designere i Figma og lage CSS-syntax som matcher den som designsystemet genererer.


P√• sikt √∏nsker vi at dette skal bli innebygd i den offisielle Designsystem pluginen. Men frem til den tiden s√• tilbyr vi denne som en workaround.


NB: Denne vil kun fungere med Designsystemets oppsett av Variabler


Github

plugins.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
plugins.description:
A plugin that helps you easily explore and manage complex Figma pages by generating a Table of Contents (TOC).


Features

1. In-plugin TOC generation

  1. Automatically collects frames with a specified prefix to generate a TOC
  2. Currently sorts frames based on their X-axis position on the Figma canvas (support for layer order coming soon)
  3. Click items to instantly navigate to the corresponding frame
  4. Supports up to 2 levels of nested items


2. Canvas TOC generation

  1. Create a TOC frame directly on the Figma canvas
  2. The TOC frame is fully customizable to suit your needs.
  3. When TOC content changes, simply select the TOC frame and click ‚ÄúUpdate‚Äù to refresh the content while preserving your custom styles.
plugins.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix.‚Ä®Click items to quickly navigate.

128139.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
128139.description:
A plugin that helps you easily explore and manage complex Figma pages by generating a Table of Contents (TOC).


Features

1. In-plugin TOC generation

  1. Automatically collects frames with a specified prefix to generate a TOC
  2. Currently sorts frames based on their X-axis position on the Figma canvas (support for layer order coming soon)
  3. Click items to instantly navigate to the corresponding frame
  4. Supports up to 2 levels of nested items


2. Canvas TOC generation

  1. Create a TOC frame directly on the Figma canvas
  2. The TOC frame is fully customizable to suit your needs.
  3. When TOC content changes, simply select the TOC frame and click ‚ÄúUpdate‚Äù to refresh the content while preserving your custom styles.
128139.release_notes: Optimized speed of extracting frames for TOC
128139.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix.‚Ä®Click items to quickly navigate.

Get accurate font-weight, font-size, color, line-height, and letter-spacing instantly, formatted in pure CSS.


Perfect for developers and designers who want a fast way to turn styled text into usable web code.

plugins.name: Heavy Page Organizer
plugins.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
plugins.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

üìÑ Section column: Sections are now placed in their own vertical column to the far right.

plugins.name: Interflow Connect
plugins.description:
Transform your design-to-management workflow with Interflow Connect, the Figma plugin that brings your UI flows directly into the Interflow. Designed for product teams and designers who demand efficiency, Interflow Connect eliminates the tedious process of manual uploads, allowing you to focus on what truly matters‚Äîcreating exceptional user interfaces.


Streamlined Workflow, Unmatched Efficiency


With Interflow Connect, transferring your designs from Figma to Interflow is as simple as a few clicks. Select your desired frames within Figma, assign or create the appropriate flow and section names, and upload your screens directly to the Interflow without ever leaving your design environment. This seamless integration ensures your UI flows are always up-to-date and easily accessible for audits and reviews, making collaboration across teams more efficient than ever.


Secure, Direct Integration


Security and simplicity are at the heart of Interflow Connect. By inputting and authenticating your personal API key‚Äîgenerated from your Interflow settings‚Äîthe plugin securely identifies your account, organization, and product. This robust authentication process guarantees that your design data is transmitted safely and accurately, offering a streamlined connection between your creative process in Figma and your product management workflow in Interflow.


Empower Your Product Design and Management


Interflow Connect is more than just a plugin‚Äîit‚Äôs the bridge between your design interface and your management platform. Whether you‚Äôre refining your product‚Äôs UI, conducting detailed audits, or ensuring that every screen aligns with your design strategy, this plugin is engineered to supercharge your workflow. Enjoy a smoother onboarding process, reduce manual errors, and keep your design projects perfectly synchronized with your product roadmap.


Experience a new level of productivity and collaboration by integrating your design and management tools. With Interflow Connect, you‚Äôre not just uploading screens‚Äîyou‚Äôre empowering your team to build better products, faster.
plugins.tagline: The bridge between your interfaces in figma and your interflow.

plugins.name: Clip Clap

Clip Clap is a Figma plugin created to quickly copy and paste text within your designs.


Features

- Copy Text: Select text layers and copy their content to Figma's clipboard.

- Paste Text: Paste copied text into selected text layers, preserving formatting and styles.

plugins.name: Figmata
plugins.description: Figmata is a tool that brings data visualization into the Figma environment, letting designers map data directly onto design elements with live, visual feedback. Unlike rigid chart tools like Excel or Illustrator, Figmata enables custom, flexible, and interactive graphics‚Äîintegrated into the design systems designers already use. It lowers the barrier to entry compared to D3 by working within Figma's component-based structure and offering code autocompletion for advanced users. Figmata supports CSV/JSON input, direct manipulation of visual properties, and saves state for iterative work. It bridges the gap between data and UI design, making data-rich interfaces more intuitive and design-friendly.
plugins.tagline: Data-driven design directly in Figma

plugins.name: CSV to Table in Figma
plugins.description:
Transform your data into editable tables directly within Figma with the CSV to Table plugin. This plugin allows you to easily import and visualize your data in a structured format. Perfect for designers who need to incorporate data tables into their wireframes without the hassle of manual entry.


Key Features:


‚Ä¢ Easy Import: Upload CSV files to automatically generate tables.

‚Ä¢ Customizable Layouts: Define the number of rows and columns, and customize cell dimensions.

‚Ä¢ Drag and Drop: Convenient drag-and-drop functionality for file uploads.

‚Ä¢ Data Visualization: Instantly convert raw data into a clean, editable table format.

‚Ä¢ Integration: Seamlessly works within Figma to enhance your design workflow.


Say goodbye to tedious data entry and hello to efficient data visualization. Enhance your Figma projects with structured tables in just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: Transform Data Files into Editable Tables in Figma

plugins.name: Update Genres Usage
plugins.description:
The page must have at least one of the following section hierarchies with the following names and elements within them:


- info (section)
    - genre (section)
        - genre name (shape with text)   <----|
    - game (section)                      (connection)
        - game name (shape with text)    <----|



Genre name must be connected to shapes containing game names and only to them.




For example we have such structure:




"info" section _______________________________________
|
| "genre" section _________________________
| |                                       |
| |  "genre name 1"        "genre name 2" |
| |_________|_____________________|________
|           |-------------------> |
| "game" s._|____       "game" s._|_____
| |         v   |       |         v    |
| | "game name1"|       | "game name2" |
| |______________       |_______________
|
|_______________________________________________




After the update, it will look like this


"info" section _______________________________________
|
| "genre" section _________________________
| |                                       |
| |  "genre name 1"        "genre name 2" |
| |     (2/2)                   (1/2)     |
| |_________|_____________________|________
|           |-------------------> |
| "game" s._|____       "game" s._|_____
| |         v   |       |         v    |
| | "game name1"|       | "game name2" |
| |______________       |_______________
|
|_______________________________________________
plugins.tagline: Update Genres Usage

plugins.name: Responsive Font-Size Generator (CSS clamp)
plugins.description:
Generate perfect CSS clamp() values for responsive typography in seconds


Transform your Figma text elements into production-ready responsive CSS with intelligent clamp() value generation. Select any text element and get perfectly scaled typography that works beautifully across all devices.


‚ú® Key Features

  1. Smart Typography Scaling: Mobile-first approach with 75-80% reduction for optimal readability
  2. Intelligent Variable Naming: Automatically suggests semantic CSS variable names (--h1-base, --h2-base, etc.)
  3. One-Click Workflow: Select text ‚Üí Copy clamp value ‚Üí Paste into CSS
  4. Container Query Ready: Uses modern cqw units for fluid responsive design
  5. Clean Output: Production-ready CSS with no unnecessary trailing zeros


üé® Example Output

--h1-base: clamp(1.88rem, 4.2cqw, 2.5rem);
--h2-base: clamp(1.5rem, 4.2cqw, 2rem);
--text-xl: clamp(1rem, 2.2cqw, 1.25rem);

No more manual calculations or responsive typography headaches ‚Äì just perfect clamp values, every time.


üîó Also check out our Figma to Oxygen Builder Plugin for complete design-to-WordPress conversion!


wpconverters.com
plugins.tagline: Get perfect responsive Font-Size properties

plugins.name: Fair Colors
plugins.description:
Fair Colors is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your color workflow, helping you manage, apply, and audit colors within your designs.


Key Features:


Extract Colors: Quickly grab all unique colors from your current selection, including solid fills and gradients.

Organize Palettes: Create and manage multiple color palettes, giving them custom names for easy organization.

Apply & Replace: Effortlessly apply saved colors to selected layers or replace existing colors throughout your selection.

Smart Highlighting: Instantly highlight all layers in your canvas that use a specific color, making auditing and adjustments a breeze.

Track Changes: Identify and manage color discrepancies by generating a "Fair Colors Changes" frame that visually shows differences between your saved palette and colors found in your selection.

Export Tokenized Colors: Generate a clean, tokenized reference frame of your used colors, perfect for design system documentation or developer handoff.

Fair Color helps you maintain consistency, identify rogue colors, and accelerate your design process by putting powerful color management tools right at your fingertips.
plugins.tagline: Local Color Palette System

138007.name: Fair Colors
138007.description:
Fair Colors is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your color workflow, helping you manage, apply, and audit colors within your designs.


Key Features:


Extract Colors: Quickly grab all unique colors from your current selection, including solid fills and gradients.

Organize Palettes: Create and manage multiple color palettes, giving them custom names for easy organization.

Apply & Replace: Effortlessly apply saved colors to selected layers or replace existing colors throughout your selection.

Smart Highlighting: Instantly highlight all layers in your canvas that use a specific color, making auditing and adjustments a breeze.

Track Changes: Identify and manage color discrepancies by generating a "Fair Colors Changes" frame that visually shows differences between your saved palette and colors found in your selection.

Export Tokenized Colors: Generate a clean, tokenized reference frame of your used colors, perfect for design system documentation or developer handoff.

Fair Color helps you maintain consistency, identify rogue colors, and accelerate your design process by putting powerful color management tools right at your fingertips.
138007.release_notes: Fixed renaming saved color palettes bug.

plugins.name: Reorder Nested Instances Tool
plugins.description:
Reorder Nested Instances lets you reorder nested instances inside any Figma component instance. No detaching.


To undo a reorder, you can:

* Select the canvas and use 'Undo' (Cmd+Z / Ctrl+Z).

* Restore your file using Version History (before the plugin was applied).


Note: Support for persisting style overrides is actively being worked on - Please support this plugins development by providing feedback on the form found here.
plugins.tagline: Reorder nested instances with ease!

plugins.name: UX Buddy
plugins.description:
Transform your design process with instant, expert-level UX feedback.


UX Buddy is your personal design critic that never sleeps. This powerful Figma plugin analyzes your frames and provides instant, actionable feedback based on proven UX principles and industry best practices.


What UX Buddy Does:

‚ú® **Instant UX Analysis** - Get comprehensive design feedback in seconds, not hours

üéØ **Actionable Insights** - Receive specific, implementable recommendations to improve your designs

üé® **Visual Design Review** - Analyze color usage, typography, spacing, and visual hierarchy

üì± **Accessibility Checks** - Ensure your designs meet accessibility standards and guidelines

üöÄ **Workflow Integration** - Seamlessly integrates into your existing Figma workflow


Key Features:

- **Smart Color Analysis** - Detect contrast issues and color harmony problems

- **Typography Review** - Identify font pairing, hierarchy, and readability issues

- **Layout Evaluation** - Analyze spacing, alignment, and visual balance

- **UX Best Practices** - Get feedback based on established design principles

- **Detailed Reports** - Receive comprehensive analysis with prioritized recommendations

- **Real-time Feedback** - Instant analysis as you design


Perfect For:

- **Product Designers** looking to validate their design decisions

- **UX/UI Designers** wanting to ensure best practices

- **Design Teams** seeking consistent quality standards

- **Freelancers** who need expert-level feedback

- **Students** learning design principles


How It Works:

1. Select any frame in your Figma file

2. Click the UX Buddy plugin

3. Get instant, expert-level analysis

4. Implement suggested improvements

5. Create better user experiences


**Professional-grade analysis** - Providing comprehensive design critique and UX insights based on industry standards and proven methodologies.


Stop guessing about your design decisions. Let UX Buddy guide you toward creating exceptional user experiences that delight and convert.

accepted.name: Opeyemi Ajagbe
accepted.description: I craft digital products that empower people and drive business growth.

plugins.tagline: Expert UX analysis that makes your designs better, instantly.

plugins.name: Content Fillr
plugins.description:
ContentFillr streamlines your design workflow by instantly filling frames and text nodes with realistic avatars and meaningful content. No more manual placeholder updates, quickly bring your designs to life with one click!


Key Features:

  1. ‚ö°Ô∏è Auto-fill selected frames with unique, realistic avatar images.
  2. ‚úèÔ∏è Instantly generate AI-powered text content tailored to your needs.
  3. üéØ Easy-to-use filters for avatars by gender.
  4. üåê Free avatar library sourced from Unsplash for hassle-free use.


Save time, boost productivity, and focus on the creative work you love.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Populate Designs with Smart Content & Avatars üöÄ

138396.release_notes:
üåü New Feature: Auto-Fill Logos in Your Designs!
You can now auto-fill selected frames with brand logos, just like avatars!

Here‚Äôs how it works:
1. Select your frames or shapes
2. Choose Logo from the Type dropdown
3. Hit Generate & Fill

Logos will be applied instantly, pulled from my curated logo library hosted on a fast, secure CDN.
138396.tagline: Effortlessly Populate Designs with Smart Content & Avatars üöÄ

plugins.name: Figma to Amplitude Taxonomy Exporter
plugins.description:
If your team hands off the tracking plan along with the design in figma and then manually creates the tracking plan inside amplitude again, use this plugin to export the tracking plan inside figma and import it to amplitude.


Just write your event and event properties in the syntax shown in the instructions, select all events you want to export, run the plugin and get the csv.
plugins.tagline: Send tracking plan from Figma to Amplitude in two clicks

plugins.name: Awesome Bulk Metadata Importer
plugins.description:
Have you ever tried to add extra documentation to your Figma components, looking or better parity with your code or docs site? With this plugin, you can better utilize the Assets menu by searching components or icons by description or keywords.


This plugin checks a JSON file, and updates the alt text/description, synonym keywords, and link for all components and variants. Run this 1x for your entire library and stop wasting time manually updating metadata!


Sample CSV and JSON template
plugins.tagline: Bulk update your component descriptions, keywords, and docs link
